description: A CSS file containing CSS variables and styles for theme management in the application interface.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application container with centered text and background color based on the theme.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Styling for the application logo with animation for spinning effect.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header styling for the application with flexbox layout.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styling for links in the app with transition effects.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styling for the theme toggle button, including hover and active states.
